FW The Enron SongOriginal Message From Heizenrader Tim Sent Friday March AM To Sheppard Kathryn Subject The Enron Song Heard this Play the attached w Realplayer
HR Conf Call Khymberly Booth Don Miller and PDX Officepst Call in number Pass Code
HR Conf Call Khymberly Booth Don Miller and PDX Officepst When Wednesday June PM PM GMT Pacific Time US Canada Tijuana Call in number Pass Code

Lunch for Julie on Friday Cc Lisa and Virginia A few of us are planning to take Julie to lunch on Friday She wanted to go to Typhoon in NW PDX for Thai food Jody mentioned that you might be interested in joining us So far its Grace Jody and I Let me know so I can change the reservation Were going to leave here at about a pick up Grace at and the reservations are for am Julie is driving Kathy

Memorial Day Weekendpst Murray would like everyone to plan to get an early start on the Memorial Day weekend A pizza lunch will be provided to the floor at noon on Friday Plan to enjoy lunch and then head home to enjoy the holiday HAPPY MEMORIAL DAY For those people who submit timesheets to Murray please have them in by Thursday afternoon
Timekeepingpst Hello all Happy Monday For Timekeeping purposes please let me know the distribution of your work hours to EPMIVM EES ENW etc for the pay period Thanks Kathy

FW Resignation Letterpst Susan asked that this be sent to the floor Well miss you Susan Original Message From Rance Susan Sent Wednesday May AM To ONeil Murray P Sheppard Kathryn Grace Rebecca M Kearney Julie Subject Resignation Letter To whom my resignation concerns My last day of work at Enron Corp will be Friday May th I will assume my new position at Sempra Energy Solutions on Monday May th It has been a pleasure working with all of you Sincerely Susan E Rance
Steve Cooper visit to Portlandpst Please note Steve Cooper is in Portland visiting the PGE offices today and may be stopping by the Enron office to say hello K
Umbrellapst Lisa Do you know what happened to the IMAX umbrella you borrowed last month Gordon is trying to track it down Thanks Kathy

Pizza lunch for the floor tomorrow pst ENA Floor Paul Kaufman is treating the floor to a pizza and salad lunch tomorrow Tuesday at noon Be sure to take this opportunity to wish both Paul and Grace Rodriguez the best of luck as they leave for new opportunities Kathy

BLAZER PLAYOFF TICKETS HURRY pst If you are interested in ordering Blazer Playoff tickets please read the following information Kathy Original Message From John Edwards mailto Sent Thursday April PM To Sheppard Kathryn Subject BLAZERS vs LAKERS Playoff Tickets Still Available and Schedule Call John Attention ENRON NORTH AMERICA EMPLOYEES EXPERIENCE A PLAYOFF GAME LIVE AND IN PERSON Seats still available for the Playoffs and save on all service charges Home Schedule April th Sun vs Lakers pm May st Wed vs Lakers TBD if necessary st Round Playoff Pricingone seat prices Level Sideline Preferred Seats Grey Section Start at have other prices available Level Corners and End Zones Blue Section Level Lower Corners Green Section Level Sideline Purple Section Level Corners and Endzones Red and Brown Section Other price categories available To get your seats call John Edwards at or EMail tickets subject to availability so call early To see a map with the colored sections go to and click on tickets then season tickets John Edwards Account Executive Portland Trail Blazers

FW Test of OATI Certificatespst Original Message From Bill Comish mailto Sent Monday June AM To Subject Test of OATI Certificates On Wednesday June at MDT PDT we will test the EHV web site servers ability to utilize OATI digital certificates This will require moving to the backup server for about an hour While on the backup access to the site will not be available through Tradewave After the test we will switch back to Tradewave Wed like as many people as possible to participate in this test To participate you must have an OATI digital certificate If you do not yet have an OATI certificate and are ready to get one please send a message to me and Ill let OATI know It will take days to obtain and install a certificate Please let me know today if you plan to participate in the test Following the test Ill be requesting information from you as to how successful you were in accessing the site As I have announced before after June the access through Tradewave will no longer be available

FW Using other Certificatespst Original Message From Bill Comish mailto Sent Wednesday June PM To Subject Using other Certificates Ive had a couple questions about being able to use DST certificates to access our web site The answer is no We could program the server to accept certificates from different sources but we would have to install a server certificate for each one DST wants about k to do that OATIs is next to nothing by comparison And OATI client side certificates are free to OATI clients year to nonclients So if you want to have access to the EHV web site and dont have an OATI digital certificate youll need to get one

FW More on OATI Certificatespst Original Message From Bill Comish mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To Cc Ben Porath Subject More on OATI Certificates We are hoping to be able to begin using OATI certificates by the end of this week or early next week At some point I will notify you of a default password to use for your first login You will be expected to replace the default with your own password on your first login However before we can implement I need updated information from you Please reply to this message with the following information User name Email address Phone number Do you currently have an OATI digital certificate I you have an OATI certificate what is the common name If you do not have an OATI certificate what is the name of your Security Officer or security contact I am not certain at this point whether we can use Tradewave and OATI certificates in parallel It seems to be a good possibility but hasnt yet been confirmed If we are able to do so we have until the end of June to complete everyones conversion If not we will have to pick a date certain for the change Since I will be on the road from June the changeover date would have to be no later than June The attached file describes how to obtain a certificate from OATI

FW EHV Web Sitepst Original Message From Bill Comish mailto Sent Friday May PM To Sheppard Kathryn Subject RE EHV Web Site Enron is paid up through June for two people The current names on the account are Tim Heizenrader and Robert Cooper Richey However unless they left their security files with Enron you will be unable to use the site without registering again with Tradewave This is not a good time to do this because Tradewave goes away on June We are moving our website security to OATI about midJune If you want continued access to the site you will have to get an OATI certificate and let me know who you want to register Ill be charging year per person for administrative costs OATI certificates are free to OATI clients year for others I dont have all the details on how to switch over yet but expect to have them in a couple weeks Ill put your name on my distribution list so you will receive instructions when I send them to everyone else Bill Subject RE EHV Web Site Date sent Fri May From Sheppard Kathryn Kathryn NRONcom To Bill Could you please let me know what the agreement on the EHV Web Site entails cost and any remaining time on the contract with Enron Thanks Kathy Sheppard Original Message From Bill Comish mailto Sent Thursday May AM To Heizenrader Tim Cc ONeil Murray P Sheppard Kathryn Subject RE EHV Web Site Tim Thanks for the help Im going to update the email list with your address and wait to hear from Enron before going any further Bill Subject RE EHV Web Site Date sent Thu May From Heizenrader Tim To Copies to murraypo Bill Both Cooper and I moved from Enron to UBS is February but the EHV accounts remain with Enron I dont know about current status or usage but I assume that theyll want to preserve the access rights at least to the extent that theyre prepaid Ive ccd this reply to the Enron officer directing the Portland estate and to the Portland office manager I expect that youll hear from them but if not Ill be glad to facilitate My new email is and my phone number remains Tim Original Message From Bill Comish mailto Sent Thursday May AM To Heizenrader Tim Subject EHV Web Site Tim Im trying to clean up my account records for the EHV web site I still show you and Cooper Richey as active under Enron I never have updated my distribution list with your new email address so you may not be aware of the issues with Tradewave If you are continuing to use the web site Ill update my list and let you know what is going on If not Ill delete you Thanks Bill Comish Ph Fax Visit our energy trading website at or UBS Warburgs main website at as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Bill Comish Ph Fax

FW Job description documentation Cc po See attachment Original Message From Sheppard Kathryn Sent Thursday March PM To Elafandi Mo Sarnowski Julie Gang Lisa Thompson Virginia Cavanaugh Darren Kane Paul Cc ONeil Murray P Subject Job description documentation Attached is a breakdown of duties and the person assigned to carry them out Please look it over and let me know of any neccessary changes or additions Just a reminder Last week Murray requested that the group work up standardized documentation describing the steps necessary to complete each of the duties listed in the attached job list He would like the information on his desk Monday morning If you would like assistance with production of the documentation I would be happy to help Please get the info to me by noon tomorrow Friday Thanks Kathy

Job description documentation Cc po Attached is a breakdown of duties and the person assigned to carry them out Please look it over and let me know of any neccessary changes or additions Just a reminder Last week Murray requested that the group work up standardized documentation describing the steps necessary to complete each of the duties listed in the attached job list He would like the information on his desk Monday morning If you would like assistance with production of the documentation I would be happy to help Please get the info to me by noon tomorrow Friday Thanks Kathy

FW Energy Consumptionpst Original Message From Young Margaret Sent Thursday June PM To Blackburn Jody Sheppard Kathryn ubiconcom ubiconcom Cc ROUSE MIKE Subject Energy Consumption We need to inform you that today and probably for or days we need to try and save as much power as possible turning lights off when not needed close window coverings to stop heat coming in etc The reason being over the weekend some vandalism took place at our Canyon substation and we are working to get it up and running asap but with temperatures in the s and air conditioners being switched on this could cause some big problems for all businesses downtown We appreciate everything you can do to get us through the next few days We will keep you updated Thank you so much

FW Portland West Desk Farewell PartyJune th pmMark Your Calendarpst Original Message From Heizenrader Tim mailto Sent Thursday June AM To Sheppard Kathryn Subject FW Portland West Desk Farewell PartyJune th pmMark Your Calendar Kathy Did this find its way to your group Tim Original Message From Comnes Alan Sent Wednesday June PM To DLUBSWE Portland Dasovich Jeff Mcdonald Michael Greg Wolfe Email Kit Blair Email Julie Kearney Email Paul Kaufman Email Cc Woodland Andrea Subject Portland West Desk Farewell PartyJune th pmMark Your Calendar Come to the Portland West Desk Farewell Party Untitled Attachment What Lots of change lots of relocation goin on Lets all get together and give the Houstonbound folks one last taste of Portland beer and hor doeuvres share memories and have a great time Who All Portland UBS Warburg Energy folks as well as exE people Please pass this invite onto anyone you wish to have a beer with Hope to see you there When Tuesday June th pm Where Untitled Attachment McMenamins Kennedy School NE rd Avenue Portland Oregon see directions below if you need em Details Well meet at the Courtyard restaurant outside if its nice inside if it is not We cant officially reserve tables but a few of us will go early please let us know if you would like to be assigned to this important detail and snag tables Drink responsibly drive safely Dont Ask Why If you have a question please contact Alan Comnes Alan BSWenergycom or Andrea Woodland Andrea BSWenergycom Untitled Attachment Visit our energy trading website at or UBS Warburgs main website at This message contains confidential information and is intended only for the individual named If you are not the named addressee you should not disseminate distribute or copy this email Please notify the sender immediately by email if you have received this email by mistake and delete this email from your system Email transmission cannot be guaranteed to be secure or errorfree as information could be intercepted corrupted lost destroyed arrive late or incomplete or contain viruses The sender therefore does not accept liability for any errors or omissions in the contents of this message which arise as a result of email transmission If verification is required please request a hardcopy version This message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related financial instruments

OATI Invoices Cc po We have been having some difficulty locating OATI invoices and it may be that they are being routed incorrectly If you receive an OATI monthly invoice please forward it to me ASAP so that we can submit it for payment Thanks Kathy

FW Street Closurepst Original Message From Young Margaret Sent Thursday June PM To Blackburn Jody Sheppard Kathryn ubiconcom ubiconcom Subject Street Closure Unfortunately we have been informed that North Bound Traffic on Naito Parkway will be closed through this weekend If you are traveling south you will be able to enter onto Taylor to parking garage This will cause some inconvenience to some parkers We have been unsuccessful to get the City of Portland to redirect traffic to make easy access for our tenants

FW More on OATI Certificatespst Original Message From Bill Comish mailto Sent Tuesday June AM To Cc Ben Porath Subject More on OATI Certificates We are hoping to be able to begin using OATI certificates by the end of this week or early next week At some point I will notify you of a default password to use for your first login You will be expected to replace the default with your own password on your first login However before we can implement I need updated information from you Please reply to this message with the following information User name Email address Phone number Do you currently have an OATI digital certificate I you have an OATI certificate what is the common name If you do not have an OATI certificate what is the name of your Security Officer or security contact I am not certain at this point whether we can use Tradewave and OATI certificates in parallel It seems to be a good possibility but hasnt yet been confirmed If we are able to do so we have until the end of June to complete everyones conversion If not we will have to pick a date certain for the change Since I will be on the road from June the changeover date would have to be no later than June The attached file describes how to obtain a certificate from OATI

WTC Parkingpst Portland Employees At this time Enron Portland has parking spots allocated based on floor space and number of employees As UBS employees leave we do not automatically have the ability to take over their spots However in renegotiating our lease with PGE we will address the possibility of taking over more that the allocated spots We will keep you updated as to the progress of this For now Khymberly Booth is checking into the availability of or more of our spots and will offer any available spots to Portland employees based on Portland office seniority We will contact you individually if a spot becomes available If you have any questions please contact Kathy Sheppard or Khymberly Booth Thanks Khymberly Booth
Phone Listpst Lisa Heres the phone list you requested Where I found multiple numbers I bolded the first number Let me know if you need changes Kathy

Expense reportspst If you would like assistance with expense reports but have not yet designated me as your admin please log into XMS and make the necessary change Also please change your designated Manager if necessary If you have any questions give me a call at Thanks Designating an Administrative Assistant To designate an Administrative Assistant Click My Info On the My Info page select the Concur Expense tab From the contents area on the left choose Workflow In the Administrative Assistant area of the Workflow page click the Search button On the Search Employee page enter the first or last name of the assistant Kathryn Sheppard Click Find to display the search results In the search results area click the name of the employee you want to designate as your assistant The name you selected appears in the Administrative Assistant area of the Workflow page On the Workflow page click Save to save the new information Note If you are an administrative assistant depending on your company settings you may not be able to submit an expense report for your manager If you try you will receive a message that alerts you to this If you do not receive a message then you may submit the expense report for your manager Removing an Administrative Assistant If you previously designated an Administrative Assistant the name of that person appears in the Administrative Assistant area of the Workflow page To remove an Administrative Assistant On the Workflow page click the Clear button located next to the Administrative Assistant text box Click Save to save the changes

FW Production of documents relating to California energy trading Cc Original Message From Erwin Kenton Sent Tuesday February AM To ONeil Murray P Cc Erwin Kenton Sanders Richard B Subject Production of documents relating to California energy trading Murray in line with our discussion last week could you please forward this email to everyone in Portland whom you think might have documents contracts confirmations notes etc relating to California energy trades We are required to produce all such documents in connection with the ongoing investigations into EPMIs and ENAs energy trading practices As Richard told us last week we already have all the information that was in the possession of persons now at UBS We are looking for just hard documents and notes not electronic stuff which has already been reviewed If any of your addressees have any such document or are not sure if they do they should contact me ASAP Thanks Kenton Erwin

Housekeepingpst Just a few housekeeping items Expense reports If you would like assistance with expense reports I would be happy to prepare them for you TriMet Bus Passes I am working up a list of people who receive a bus pass each month If you wish to continue to receive a pass please send me an email to that effect Iron Mountain Storage We will be sending a shipment of boxes to storage today If you have material which needs to be stored or if your recycle box is overflowing and needs to go away please let me know Thanks Kathy

Web Based Expense Report Implementation Deadlinensf You indicated that you are interested in creating your own expense reports Please follow the attached instructions in creating your profile I will provide you with special expense report envelopes and the office procedures that we will be following in submitting expense reports If you have any problems getting started just let me know Kathy Forwarded by Kathryn SheppardPDXECT on PM From Judy Knepshield ENRON PM Sent by Enron NRON To All Enron Employees United States cc Subject Web Based Expense Report Implementation Deadline XMS COMMUNICATION The Expense Management System XMS is a tool used to electronically submit your expense report for approval and payment through the Enron Intranet It is user friendly accurate and less labor intensive for you and our accounting staff This product was initially made available October and approximately of the Houston employees are currently using it to submit their expense reports Our goal is to have all Enron employees usin g the XMS system by April income tax dayeasy to remember There are some changes coming to the Accounts Payable AP Department that are compelling us to fully utilize the XMS system In the near future pape r and email directed expense reports will not be accepted If you are unsur e of how to use the XMS system there is training available through LEAP that will explain how to use the system The following training information is from the December th Enron Announcement about XMS TRAINING Go to the IT Central web page Select ServicesTraining Click on Schedules in the North America column and go to the XMS Workshop schedul e to choose your class If no classes are listed call the training department and place your request at Those in outlying locations and those who prefer online training can use LEAP by signing on to iscenroncom and clicking on training and education then LEAP shown as a link Use xms lower case as the User ID and Password DOCUMENTATION Step by Step documentation is also available from IT Central web page Sele ct ServicesTraining Click on Documentation in the North America column an d choose XMS Users Guide from the list APPLICATION SUPPORT SERVICES Call the ISC help desk at SAP Do not call Accounts Payable with questions about how to use the system or with issues regarding electronic prepopulated data
